column4: anyone have a how-to for intel pro wireless 3945?  it detects networks but does not connect.
my 3945 has worked fine when I've used it
out of the box
yes out of the box, from a live cd, whatever
irc doesn't support voice chat
well in private channel ops can give or take voice with /voice nick
having +v status means that you can chat when the channel is in moderated (+m) mode
oh.. I C thanks for pointing that out.
i'm just curious.. what time is it there?
ok, i just wanted to know if i was the only crazy one up this late/early.
if Gazingson comes back (ndiswrapper guy) tell him thanks for leavin me hangin after a reboot when i just gave him an hour of my life for me would ya? its bed for me. goodnight.
i know you think i probably step on your toes.. but the truth is.. some of us look up to others like you.. I see your putting in the good work.. right on! goodnight friend.
step on my toes? i don't know anything
all i do is copy/paste people's questions into google and paste them results
for the most part
lol.. well i can see your experience is more than mine.. but i try.. and sometimes i win :)
